description: One or more aspect of organisational management is unsuccessful, resulting in a failure to deliver an anticipated or required business outcome.
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Conceive comprehensive management policies and procedures and establish mechanisms for their regular review
- Establish benchmarks to determine effectiveness of management policies and procedures In the event of risk’s execution:
- Establish continuity or recovery mechanisms to recover from effects
name: Management failure
preMitigationNotes:
- Repository management fails to allocate sufficient resources to complete one or more business activities
- Management’s adopted preservation strategies result in information loss
